In applying this license, CERN does not waive the privileges and immunities granted to it by virtue of its status as an Intergovernmental Organization or submit itself to any jurisdiction.================ INSPIRE-DoJSON================.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/inspirehep/inspire-dojson.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/inspirehep/inspire-dojson.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/github/inspirehep/inspire-dojson/badge.svg?branch=master :target: https://coveralls.io/github/inspirehep/inspire-dojson?branch=masterAbout=====INSPIRE-specific rules to transform from MARCXML to JSON and back.
